TopicTitle: Game gives a run time error

Articles.Content:
This happens every time I try to pilot a ship. A window pops up and says that there's a run time error. Then the game stops and shuts down.

Mods installed:

  • Toolbar
  • Distant Object Enhancement
  • Kopernicus
  • Mechjeb
  • Mechjeb Embedded
  • Realistic Remodel (This is probably the source of the problem)
  • Sigma Binary
  • Sigma Dimensions

Edit: I've confirmed that Realistic remodel is the source of the problem, meaning that I need to fix it myself. (I have now fixed it)

Edited May 11, 2016 by WillThe84th
